name: Soul Pack Reader
description: Load character persona packs (Soul Packs) with portable memory. MemoryEngine records conversations independently of the AI host.

packPath.description: Absolute path to a .soulpack.json file to auto-load on startup

stateDir.description: Directory to store soul state files. Defaults to ~/.openclaw/soulpack-data/

maxMemories.description: Maximum number of memory entries to keep. Older entries are automatically truncated. Default: 200

maxTranscripts.description: Maximum number of transcript files per pack. Oldest are deleted. Default: 50
